rule.description: In tar in BusyBox through 1.37.0, a TAR archive can have filenames hid ...
rule.name: OsPackageVulnerability
rule.full_description: In tar in BusyBox through 1.37.0, a TAR archive can have filenames hidden from a listing through the use of terminal escape sequences.
rule.help:
**Vulnerability CVE-2025-46394**
| Severity | Package | Fixed Version | Link |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
|LOW|ssl_client|1.37.0-r20|[CVE-2025-46394](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2025-46394)|

In tar in BusyBox through 1.37.0, a TAR archive can have filenames hidden from a listing through the use of terminal escape sequences.

message.text:
Package: ssl_client
Installed Version: 1.37.0-r19
Vulnerability CVE-2025-46394
Severity: LOW
Fixed Version: 1.37.0-r20
Link: [CVE-2025-46394](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2025-46394)

rule.description: In netstat in BusyBox through 1.37.0, local users can launch of networ ...
rule.name: OsPackageVulnerability
rule.full_description: In netstat in BusyBox through 1.37.0, local users can launch of network application with an argv[0] containing an ANSI terminal escape sequence, leading to a denial of service (terminal locked up) when netstat is used by a victim.
rule.help:
**Vulnerability CVE-2024-58251**
| Severity | Package | Fixed Version | Link |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
|MEDIUM|ssl_client|1.37.0-r20|[CVE-2024-58251](https://avd.aquasec.com/nvd/cve-2024-58251)|

In netstat in BusyBox through 1.37.0, local users can launch of network application with an argv[0] containing an ANSI terminal escape sequence, leading to a denial of service (terminal locked up) when netstat is used by a victim.
